Translations.Text: O you who believe, do not be distracted by your money and your children from the remembrance of God. And those who do this, then they are the losers

And give from that which We have provided to you, before death comes to one of you, then he says: "My Lord, if only You could delay this for a short while, I would then be charitable and join the righteous
And God will not delay any soul if its time has come. And God is Expert in all that you do
